{"step_by_step_thinking": "CPX-351 is a liposomal formulation of cytarabine and daunorubicin, which are antineoplastic drugs used in the treatment of acute myeloid leukemia (AML) as per documents 0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 14, 15, 19, 21, 24, 27. There is no mention of CPX-351 being used for the treatment of tuberculosis in any of the provided documents. The treatment for tuberculosis typically involves a combination of drugs such as isoniazid, rifampicin, pyrazinamide, and ethambutol as per documents 16, 17, 25, 26, 28, 29, 30.", "answer_choice": "B"}
